attributes.action: Require MP's to call by elections on Brexit
attributes.additional_details: Zac Goldsmith ritghtly called a by election and his constituents have rejected him becuase he did not represent their views. All MP's whose views do not match their consitituents should follow suit. Let the people decide if they want you or not.
attributes.background: MP's represent their constituents and not themseslves. So those whose views (leave, hard or soft and remain) are not reflective of the majority of their electorate should submit to the ballot box, so Parliament represents the people.

rejection.details: A decision about whether to resign is for an individual MP to make, not the Government or Parliament as a whole.
